author: Cecilia S
title: Started rough but got much better. Great Staff!
text:
The first night I stayed I wasn't sure I would remain. The room did not smell good, it had a mildew odor and (since I checked in late) I just lived with it. But I packed up and took my bags downstairs the next morning to request a new room. They didn't budge on making me wait for my new room until after 2 pm, but they did give me a nice room that smelled great and the rest of the trip was really delightful. The staff is super helpful and quite kind. I liked everyone that I met, both desk staff and cleaning.
The hotel is located very close to a metro stop and a nice walk from Place de la Republique. The breakfast is fine. The neighborhood is pretty hopping at night, so I think it might work better for a younger person (or at least young at heart) but overall I enjoyed my stay.
